column3: ## Enter an article
Go to the "Enter Article Metadata" tab in the "Publisher Area"
Do not fill in any data yet. Click "Add Article" button at the bottom of the page

column4: You are scrolled back up to the Title field
Title field is focussed (it is possible to type straight into the field without the need to click in it)

column3:
In "Article Title" textbox enter valid article title
 (any string of characters)
Do not fill in any more data. Click "Add Article" button at the bottom of the page

column4: Red error: 'You must provide the Full-Text URL or the DOI' appears under the URL field and the DOI field
Red error "Please provide at least one author" under Authors fields appears
Red error "Either this field or Online ISSN is required" under "ISSN, Print" appears
Red error "Either this field or Print ISSN is required" under "ISSN, Online" appears

column3: In Authors section click on orange "Add more authors" button

column4: One row for author is added

column3: In Authors section click on one of the white "Remove author" button
Clear the form by clicking 'Enter article metadata' tab at the top to start again
Enter a title
Enter a malformed DOI
Click Add Article at the bottom

column4: Red error message: Invalid DOI. A DOI can optionally start with a prefix (such as "doi:"), followed by "10." and the remainder of the identifier

column3: Enter one or more author's name(s)  of the article eg "Aga Domanska"
Click "Add Article" button

column4: Error message under Authors disappears but others remain

column3: Add author's ORCID iD in the wrong format eg "0000-0000-0000-000a"
Click "Add Article" button

column4: Red error message: 'Invalid ORCID iD. Please enter your ORCID iD structured as: https://orcid.org/0000-0000-0000-0000. URLs must start with https.'

column3: Enter valid Orcid iD for one of the authors
Enter valid Full-Text URL, eg: https://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Torun
Select ISSN print and online version from dropdowns

column4: On dropdown lists your issns are available to choose

column3: Select 2 identical ISSNs
Click "Add Article" button

column4: The error: "The Print and Online ISSNs supplied are identical. If you supply 2 ISSNs they must be different." is shown below each ISSN field.

column3: Choose different Online ISSN
Click "Add Article" button

column4: At the top of the page you see the confirmation message:  Article created/updated (Dismiss)
